meanings.definition: The quality or state of being retiring.
meanings.sent1: Her retiringness made her a quiet and reserved person.
meanings.sent2: I admire the retiringness of my grandmother, who enjoys spending time alone.
meanings.sent3: Despite her retiringness, she surprised everyone with a lively dance at the party.
meanings.sent4: The retiringness of the old library was like a silent guardian of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The retiringness of the forest at night was both peaceful and mysterious.

meanings.definition: The act of withdrawing or moving away from a situation or place.
meanings.sent1: His retiringness from the argument prevented further conflict.
meanings.sent2: The retiringness of the shy child in social gatherings was noticeable.
meanings.sent3: The retiringness of the cat from the noisy room was a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The retiringness of the sun behind the clouds signaled the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The retiringness of the waves from the shore left a sense of tranquility.
